name: Party Heads
description:
Party Heads is the new, hilarious Card-On-Your-Head, Phrase Guessing Party Game.

Put your phone on your forehead while your friends try to describe and act out the cards that appear on screen. See how many you can get before the time runs out!

-= MOTION CONTROLS =-
Tilt your device down when you get the phrase correct and tilt it Up to skip. Its simple!

-= VIDEO RECAP =-
The best part of Party Heads is that your game will be recorded! You can relive the hilarious antics of your game by watching and listening to the amazing video. Share it with your friends on Facebook and Twitter.

-= AWESOME PHRASES =-
Hand picked card database of over 10K cards and growing. Play with any of these decks:
- Sports
- Celebrities
- Characters
- Just for Kids
- Big Screen Titles
- No Speaking!
- TV Shows
- Games
- Songs
- Music
- Science
- Places
- Food
- World
- Sayings
(Note 5 of these categories are included in the free version. An upgrade is required for all 17)

-= EXPANSION DECKS =-
Play with amazing and hilarious expansion decks, earned or purchased through In App Purchase.
- College
- Adult
- Tis the Season
- Tha Streetz
- Flashback, the 70's 80's and 90's
- Nerd Alert!
- Star Words
- Stars and Stripes
- Words of the Dead
- The NYCity

-= CUSTOMIZATION =-
Feel free to turn off the video recording or the motion controls. This helps older devices and makes sure you can play too.

-------
NOTE: Party Heads is supported by Ads. To remove ads, you may upgrade to the Pro version through In App Purchase after downloading
